Description: Rim and walls sherd (mended from three fragments) of North Ionian pottery plate or shallow dish; cream slip. Interior: maeander hook frieze at rim; to centre, between bands with added red bands lined in white, frieze of alternating tongues (some red) and lotus flowers with red central leaf, flanked by dots; in tondo buds and/or leaves with added red. One repair hole and part of a second.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. VII, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1090)
